overview: A gay comedy short about hook-up culture in the gay community. Andrew, a homosexual man, finally goes on a date through a gay social networking app. His quest for love through online finds him questioning himself whether heâ€™s after love or lust. He finds a guy called Ben, a financially stable and good looking man, through a social networking app and asks him on a date; his intentions were not set up for love.
title: I Lust You
